more_content:
What better way to enjoy the sublime fall weather in Key West than at an outdoor concert? Mark your calendar for The Allman Betts Band, set to play at the Sunset Green Event Lawn in Key West on Oct. 28. 

The band is a progeny of The Allman Brothers Band, so concert goers can expect classic tunes as well as exceptional songs from solo projects.

Led by Devon Allman and Dickey Betts, sons of Gregg Allman and Dickey Betts respectively, the first tour for the southern rockers jam-packed with shows. It’s only natural that Berry Duane Oakley Jr., son of the founding bass player, joins the crew on bass. The men have decades of experience touring and jamming with musicians – their success at creating their own sound, full-bodied songs and a comfortable performance space seems only second-nature.

 See The Allman Betts Band perform their new hit single

The outdoor concert will be held at the Sunset Green Event Lawn at 3820 N. Roosevelt Blvd., located between sister hotels 24 North Hotel and The Gates Hotel Key West. Guests are encouraged to arrive early to get the best spot and are free to bring chairs and blankets. Doors open at 5:30 pm.

The show is part of the band’s global tour and part of the Key West Concert Series presented by Rams Head Productions.

Enjoy an awesome concert and hotel package by booking with us at 24 North. Guests can enjoy a general admission ticket, a $25 gift certificate to the Blue Macaw Restaurant, and a Rams Head Group swag bag. See offer details.

If you book with 24 North, you don’t have to worry about parking or getting back to your hotel after the show – we’re located just steps away from the venue! Our hotel in New Town offers awesome amenities that make for a seamless stay in the Conch Republic. An onsite Starbucks and hourly shuttle service to Mallory Square are just a few benefits of staying with us. 

A Look at 24 North Hotel

 

24 North Hotel is located in Key West and offers hourly shuttle service to Mallory Square in Old Town. There, you can find the renowned Sloppy Joe’s Bar on Duval Street, the Hemingway Home & Museum, the Southernmost Point of the continental United States, and more. Intrigued? Read 24 reasons why you want to plan Key West as your next vacation destination here.
title: The Allman Betts Band Comes to the Sunset Green
seo_title: The Allman Betts Band Comes to the Sunset Green
short_description: What better way to enjoy the sublime weather in Key West than at an outdoor concert?
seo_description: What better way to enjoy the sublime weather in Key West than at an outdoor concert? Mark your calendar for The Allman Betts Band, set to play at the Sunset Green Event Lawn in Key West on Oct. 28.   Concert goers can expect exceptional songs from solo projects as well as classic tunes from the Allman Brothers Band in honor of its 50th anniversary.
